description: The struggle of catching up with elusive dreams humorously personified.
title: Dreams Chase
n_1: Alex decides to stop chasing his ever-elusive dreams.
c1_1: Why keep chasing you if you always run?
c2_1: Maybe you're not running fast enough!
n_2: Instead, he plans to directly ask where they're headed.
c1_2: Alright, where are you off to next?
c2_2: Somewhere fun, but it's a secret!
n_3: Alex waits patiently, hoping to intersect paths.
c1_3: I'll just wait for my dreams to come to me.
c2_3: Good luck with that, I'm quite unpredictable.
n_4: Finally, they meet at a crossroad; Dreams had a change of heart.
c2_4: I got tired of running. Let's walk together.
